LanguageData.MetalTile.label: metal tile
LanguageData.MetalTile.description: Metal tiles, for that spaceship look. Pretty, but labor and material-intensive.
LanguageData.SilverTile.label: silver tile
LanguageData.SilverTile.description: Expensive and slow to build, but very pretty. Fits perfectly into all kinds of luxurious rooms.
LanguageData.GoldTile.label: gold tile
LanguageData.GoldTile.description: The most beautiful and impressive kind of floor. Very expensive and requires a lot of work to build.
LanguageData.SterileTile.label: sterile tile
LanguageData.SterileTile.description: Sterile tiles help keep the room clean. Very useful in hospitals to prevent patients from getting various infections. Neutral in terms of looks and very slow to build.
LanguageData.PavedTile.label: コンクリートタイル
LanguageData.PavedTile.description: 実用本位のコンクリートタイルは、見た目が良いとは言えませんが、動きやすく作られています
LanguageData.Concrete.label: コンクリート打ちっ放し
LanguageData.Concrete.description: 早く造成されたコンクリート床なので、醜く、地面を少し掘り下げる必要があります
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor.label: 厚板床
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor.description: 木の厚板床は、暖かで自宅に居る気分になります
LanguageData.CarpetRed.label: 赤の絨毯
LanguageData.CarpetRed.description: 美しいバラ色の豪華なカーペットです
LanguageData.CarpetGreen.label: 緑の絨毯
LanguageData.CarpetGreen.description: 自然な色合いの緑のカーペットです
LanguageData.CarpetBlue.label: 青の絨毯
LanguageData.CarpetBlue.description: 涼しい青い色のつま先にぴったりな豪華なカーペットです
LanguageData.CarpetCream.label: cream carpet
LanguageData.CarpetDark.label: dark carpet
